trans-unit.source: Represents a point at which a workflow or activity can passively wait to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 表示的點上的工作流程或活動可被動等候繼續。

trans-unit.source: When an activity creates a Bookmark, it becomes idle and waits for the Bookmark to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 當活動建立書籤時，它會變成閒置狀態，並等候繼續的書籤。

trans-unit.source: If there are other activities in parallel with the activity that created the Bookmark, they will be scheduled for execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果有其他活動與建立書籤的活動平行，它們將會排定執行。

trans-unit.source: Bookmarks can be resumed by the host application using one of the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.ResumeBookmark%2A> overloads.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用其中一個主應用程式繼續書籤<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.ResumeBookmark%2A>多載。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.ResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] bookmarks, see [Using WorkflowInvoker and WorkflowApplication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Bookmarks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and the [Bookmarks [ WF Samples]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Wait For Input Activity [WF Samples]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) samples.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]書籤，請參閱[使用 WorkflowInvoker 與 WorkflowApplication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[書籤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，而[書籤 [WF 範例]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[等候的輸入活動 [WF 範例]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> class using the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref>類別使用指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A name that identifies the bookmark.
Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> refer to the same continuation point in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否目前<xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref>和指定<xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref>參考工作流程中相同的接續點。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref>物件為相等; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> and the specified object refer to the same continuation point in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否目前<xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> ，而且指定的物件參考工作流程中相同的接續點。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref>物件為相等; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a unique identifier for this <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個唯一識別碼<xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of this <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個唯一識別碼<xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bookmark name for a named bookmark or the bookmark ID for an unnamed bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具名的書籤的書籤名稱或未命名的書籤的書籤識別碼。
